Title: Lego Batman: The Videogame
Genre: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Crime, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Duncan Kinnaird (story), Phil Gray (story), Dave Brown (story), Bill Martin (story), Ole Kirk Christiansen (based on: LEGO Construction Toys), Godtfred Kirk Christiansen (based on: LEGO Construction Toys), Jens Nygaard Knudsen (based on: LEGO Construction Toys)
Actors: Ogie Banks, Steve Blum, Chris Edgerly, Keith Ferguson
Plot: The notorious criminals including the Joker, the Penguin, Catwoman, and Scarecrow have broken out of Arkham Asylum and are set to wreak havoc in Gotham City.
